text: Focus is a 2015 American romantic crime-drama movie. This movie is about a con-man drawing a young attractive woman into his romantic circle. Will Smith plays Nicky. Margot Robbie plays Jess. Focus is set in New Orleans and Buenos Aires. The movie was released on February 27, 2015. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2015 romantic drama movies Category:2010s American crime drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Argentine romance movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:Argentine crime movies Category:Movies about con artists Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Argentina Category:Movies set in Louisiana Category:New Orleans in fiction
title: Focus (2015 movie)
